about_the_game:
Earth is on the brink of full-scale war. The planet is overpopulated, resources are sorely lacking. People are busy modifying themselves, not paying attention to the world around them. Politics is dying, corporations come to the fore with their ambitious plans, becoming more and more bogged down in a technology race. Millions of lives have been thrown into the millstones of inexorable progress exchanging for grains of last resources.

After protracted corporate wars, 2 poles of power were formed, which led mega-corporations. They shared the main directions of technological progress:
Asico tech. → Development of Artificial Intelligence and remote control to mechanisms. Breakthrough research in human and robot modification.
Pegasus corp. → Creation of glissers - specialized robots suitable for both service purposes and combat missions. Construction of automated resource extraction complexes.

Gameplay

Waking up in 2179 you will find yourself in the world after a major disaster. Explore the legacy of corporations, immerse yourself in their history and use their technology to survive. Or maybe change the whole world.


The unique beauty of futuristic architecture is fraught with many dangers. Labyrinths of city streets, the secrets of abandoned dungeons, the mystery of distant planets and tremendous robotic complexes await you. Each defeat will bring valuable experience, and each victory will undoubtedly be rewarded.

Dynamic battles

Cities of the future...

...and consequences of the disaster.

Key features:

  • Immerse yourself in the aesthetics of a cyberpunk that nods to a dark dystopian future powered by the modern Unreal Engine 5.
  • Drive different types of high-tech glissers.
  • Each battle is unique! Flexible customization thanks to weapon drawings and temporary modules that drop out during combat.
  • Fight dozens of opponents in hellish battles.
  • Explore colonies, cities and planets in search of new technologies. Customize your glisser on the 'Trion' orbital station and modify it during the battle.
  • Dive into a deep and intriguing story.
  • Explore environment by trying to piece together small consequences left by past disaster.
  • Enjoy the unique musical style of each location.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. General Mature Content

name: NETCORTER: City 2179

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / R9 390 and upper
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 / RX 590 and upper
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: NETCORTER: CITY 2179 is a sci-fi storytelling third-person shooter(TPS) with a cyberpunk aesthetic and Bullet Hell and Roguelite elements. You would become a Netcorter (S-class hacker) and dive into a chain of events that followed the disaster in 2178.
